acid-arrow.name: Acid Arrow
acid-arrow.components: V, S, M (powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder’s stomach)

aid.name: Aid
aid.components: V, S, M (a tiny strip of white cloth)

alarm.name: Alarm
alarm.components: V, S, M (a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire)

animal-friendship.name: Animal Friendship
animal-friendship.components: V, S, M (a morsel of food)

animal-messenger.name: Animal Messenger
animal-messenger.components: V, S, M (a morsel of food)

animate-dead.name: Animate Dead
animate-dead.components: V, S, M (a drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust)

antimagic-field.name: Antimagic Field
antimagic-field.components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron or iron filings)

antipathy-sympathy.name: Antipathy/Sympathy
antipathy-sympathy.components: V, S, M (either a lump of alum soaked in vinegar for the antipathy effect or a drop of honey for the sympathy effect)

arcane-eye.name: Arcane Eye
arcane-eye.components: V, S, M (a bit of bat fur)

arcane-hand.name: Arcane Hand
arcane-hand.components: V, S, M (an eggshell and a snakeskin glove)

arcane-lock.name: Arcane Lock
arcane-lock.components: V, S, M (gold dust worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

arcane-sword.name: Arcane Sword
arcane-sword.components: V, S, M (a miniature platinum sword with a grip and pommel of copper and zinc, worth 250 gp)

arcanists-magic-aura.name: Arcanist’s Magic Aura
arcanists-magic-aura.components: V, S, M (a small square of silk)

astral-projection.name: Astral Projection
astral-projection.components: V, S, M (for each creature you affect with this spell, you must provide one jacinth worth at least 1,000 gp and one ornately carved bar of silver worth at least 100 gp, all of which the spell consumes)

augury.name: Augury
augury.components: V, S, M (specially marked sticks, bones, or similar tokens worth at least 25 gp)

awaken.name: Awaken
awaken.components: V, S, M (an agate worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

bane.name: Bane
bane.components: V, S, M (a drop of blood)

banishment.name: Banishment
banishment.components: V, S, M (an item distasteful to the target)

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.components: V, S, M (a handful of oak bark)

black-tentacles.name: Black Tentacles
black-tentacles.components: V, S, M (a piece of tentacle from a giant octopus or a giant squid)

bless.name: Bless
bless.components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water)

chain-lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain-lightning.components: V, S, M (a bit of fur; a piece of amber, glass, or a crystal rod; and three silver pins)

circle-of-death.name: Circle of Death
circle-of-death.components: V, S, M (the powder of a crushed black pearl worth at least 500 gp)

clairvoyance.name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.components: V, S, M (a focus worth at least 100 gp, either a jeweled horn for hearing or a glass eye for seeing)

clone.name: Clone
clone.components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 1,000 gp and at least 1 cubic inch of flesh of the creature that is to be cloned, which the spell consumes, and a vessel worth at least 2,000 gp that has a sealable lid and is large enough to hold a Medium creature, such as a huge urn, coffin, mud-filled cyst in the ground, or crystal container filled with salt water)

color-spray.name: Color Spray
color-spray.components: V, S, M (a pinch of powder or sand that is colored red, yellow, and blue)

commune.name: Commune
commune.components: V, S, M (incense and a vial of holy or unholy water)

comprehend-languages.name: Comprehend Languages
comprehend-languages.components: V, S, M (a pinch of soot and salt)

cone-of-cold.name: Cone of Cold
cone-of-cold.components: V, S, M (a small crystal or glass cone)

conjure-elemental.name: Conjure Elemental
conjure-elemental.components: V, S, M (burning incense for air, soft clay for earth, sulfur and phosphorus for fire, or water and sand for water)

conjure-woodland-beings.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
conjure-woodland-beings.components: V, S, M (one holly berry per creature summoned)

contingency.name: Contingency
contingency.components: V, S, M (a statuette of yourself carved from ivory and decorated with gems worth at least 1,500 gp)

continual-flame.name: Continual Flame
continual-flame.components: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

control-water.name: Control Water
control-water.components: V, S, M (a drop of water and a pinch of dust)

control-weather.name: Control Weather
control-weather.components: V, S, M (burning incense and bits of earth and wood mixed in water)

counterspell.name: Counterspell
counterspell.castingTime: 1 reaction, which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

create-or-destroy-water.name: Create or Destroy Water
create-or-destroy-water.components: V, S, M (a drop of water if creating water or a few grains of sand if destroying it)

create-undead.name: Create Undead
create-undead.components: V, S, M (one clay pot filled with grave dirt, one clay pot filled with brackish water, and one 150 gp black onyx stone for each corpse)

creation.name: Creation
creation.components: V, S, M (a tiny piece of matter of the same type of the item you plan to create)

dancing-lights.name: Dancing Lights
dancing-lights.components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or wychwood, or a glowworm)

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.components: V, M (bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal)

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.components: V, S, M (either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate)

delayed-blast-fireball.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
delayed-blast-fireball.components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
disintegrate.components: V, S, M (a lodestone and a pinch of dust)

dispel-evil-and-good.name: Dispel Evil and Good
dispel-evil-and-good.components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)

divination.name: Divination
divination.components: V, S, M (incense and a sacrificial offering appropriate to your religion, together worth at least 25 gp, which the spell consumes)

dream.name: Dream
dream.components: V, S, M (a handful of sand, a dab of ink, and a writing quill plucked from a sleeping bird)

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.components: V, S, M (a pinch of dirt, a piece of rock, and a lump of clay)

enhance-ability.name: Enhance Ability
enhance-ability.components: V, S, M (fur or a feather from a beast)

enlarge-reduce.name: Enlarge/Reduce
enlarge-reduce.components: V, S, M (a pinch of powdered iron)

faithful-hound.name: Faithful Hound
faithful-hound.components: V, S, M (a tiny silver whistle, a piece of bone, and a thread)

false-life.name: False Life
false-life.components: V, S, M (a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits)

fear.name: Fear
fear.components: V, S, M (a white feather or the heart of a hen)

feather-fall.name: Feather Fall
feather-fall.castingTime: 1 reaction, which you take when you or a creature within 60 feet of you falls
feather-fall.components: V, M (a small feather or piece of down)

feeblemind.name: Feeblemind
feeblemind.components: V, S, M (a handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres)

find-familiar.name: Find Familiar
find-familiar.components: V, S, M (10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier)

find-the-path.name: Find the Path
find-the-path.components: V, S, M (a set of divinatory tools—such as bones, ivory sticks, cards, teeth, or carved runes—worth 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find)

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.components: V, S, M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)

fire-shield.name: Fire Shield
fire-shield.components: V, S, M (a bit of phosphorus or a firefly)

flaming-sphere.name: Flaming Sphere
flaming-sphere.components: V, S, M (a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron)

flesh-to-stone.name: Flesh to Stone
flesh-to-stone.components: V, S, M (a pinch of lime, water, and earth)

floating-disk.name: Floating Disk
floating-disk.components: V, S, M (a drop of mercury)

fly.name: Fly
fly.components: V, S, M (a wing feather from any bird)

forbiddance.name: Forbiddance
forbiddance.components: V, S, M (a sprinkling of holy water, rare incense, and powdered ruby worth at least 1,000 gp)

forcecage.name: Forcecage
forcecage.components: V, S, M (ruby dust worth 1,500 gp)

freedom-of-movement.name: Freedom of Movement
freedom-of-movement.components: V, S, M (a leather strap, bound around the arm or a similar appendage)

freezing-sphere.name: Freezing Sphere
freezing-sphere.components: V, S, M (a small crystal sphere)

gaseous-form.name: Gaseous Form
gaseous-form.components: V, S, M (a bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke)

gate.name: Gate
gate.components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 5,000 gp)

gentle-repose.name: Gentle Repose
gentle-repose.components: V, S, M (a pinch of salt and one copper piece placed on each of the corpse’s eyes, which must remain there for the duration)

globe-of-invulnerability.name: Globe of Invulnerability
globe-of-invulnerability.components: V, S, M (a glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends)

glyph-of-warding.name: Glyph of Warding
glyph-of-warding.components: V, S, M (incense and powdered diamond worth at least 200 gp, which the spell consumes)

goodberry.name: Goodberry
goodberry.components: V, S, M (a sprig of mistletoe)

grease.name: Grease
grease.components: V, S, M (a bit of pork rind or butter)

greater-restoration.name: Greater Restoration
greater-restoration.components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

guards-and-wards.name: Guards and Wards
guards-and-wards.components: V, S, M (burning incense, a small measure of brimstone and oil, a knotted string, a small amount of umber hulk blood, and a small silver rod worth at least 10 gp)

hallow.name: Hallow
hallow.components: V, S, M (herbs, oils, and incense worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

hallucinatory-terrain.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
hallucinatory-terrain.components: V, S, M (a stone, a twig, and a bit of green plant)

haste.name: Haste
haste.components: V, S, M (a shaving of licorice root)

heat-metal.name: Heat Metal
heat-metal.components: V, S, M (a piece of iron and a flame)

hellish-rebuke.name: Hellish Rebuke
hellish-rebuke.castingTime: 1 reaction, which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see

heroes-feast.name: Heroes’ Feast
heroes-feast.components: V, S, M (a gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

hideous-laughter.name: Hideous Laughter
hideous-laughter.components: V, S, M (tiny tarts and a feather that is waved in the air)

hold-monster.name: Hold Monster
hold-monster.components: V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)

hold-person.name: Hold Person
hold-person.components: V, S, M (a small, straight piece of iron)

holy-aura.name: Holy Aura
holy-aura.components: V, S, M (a tiny reliquary worth at least 1,000 gp containing a sacred relic, such as a scrap of cloth from a saint’s robe or a piece of parchment from a religious text)

hypnotic-pattern.name: Hypnotic Pattern
hypnotic-pattern.components: S, M (a glowing stick of incense or a crystal vial filled with phosphorescent material)

ice-storm.name: Ice Storm
ice-storm.components: V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)

identify.name: Identify
identify.components: V, S, M (a pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather)

illusory-script.name: Illusory Script
illusory-script.components: S, M (a lead-based ink worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

imprisonment.name: Imprisonment
imprisonment.components: V, S, M (a vellum depiction or a carved statuette in the likeness of the target, and a special component that varies according to the version of the spell you choose, worth at least 500 gp per Hit Die of the target)

insect-plague.name: Insect Plague
insect-plague.components: V, S, M (a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat)

instant-summons.name: Instant Summons
instant-summons.components: V, S, M (a sapphire worth 1,000 gp)

invisibility.name: Invisibility
invisibility.components: V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)

jump.name: Jump
jump.components: V, S, M (a grasshopper’s hind leg)

legend-lore.name: Legend Lore
legend-lore.components: V, S, M (incense worth at least 250 gp, which the spell consumes, and four ivory strips worth at least 50 gp each)

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.components: V, S, M (either a small leather loop or a piece of golden wire bent into a cup shape with a long shank on one end)

light.name: Light
light.components: V, M (a firefly or phosphorescent moss)

lightning-bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning-bolt.components: V, S, M (a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass)

locate-animals-or-plants.name: Locate Animals or Plants
locate-animals-or-plants.components: V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)

locate-creature.name: Locate Creature
locate-creature.components: V, S, M (a bit of fur from a bloodhound)

longstrider.name: Longstrider
longstrider.components: V, S, M (a pinch of dirt)

mage-armor.name: Mage Armor
mage-armor.components: V, S, M (a piece of cured leather)

magic-circle.name: Magic Circle
magic-circle.components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

magic-jar.name: Magic Jar
magic-jar.components: V, S, M (a gem, crystal, reliquary, or some other ornamental container worth at least 500 gp)

magic-mouth.name: Magic Mouth
magic-mouth.components: V, S, M (a small bit of honeycomb and jade dust worth at least 10 gp, which the spell consumes)

magnificent-mansion.name: Magnificent Mansion
magnificent-mansion.components: V, S, M (a miniature portal carved from ivory, a small piece of polished marble, and a tiny silver spoon, each item worth at least 5 gp)

major-image.name: Major Image
major-image.components: V, S, M (a bit of fleece)

mass-suggestion.name: Mass Suggestion
mass-suggestion.components: V, M (a snake’s tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil)

message.name: Message
message.components: V, S, M (a short piece of copper wire)

moonbeam.name: Moonbeam
moonbeam.components: V, S, M (several seeds of any moonseed plant and a piece of opalescent feldspar)

move-earth.name: Move Earth
move-earth.components: V, S, M (an iron blade and a small bag containing a mixture of soils—clay, loam, and sand)

nondetection.name: Nondetection
nondetection.components: V, S, M (a pinch of diamond dust worth 25 gp sprinkled over the target, which the spell consumes)

pass-without-trace.name: Pass without Trace
pass-without-trace.components: V, S, M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)

passwall.name: Passwall
passwall.components: V, S, M (a pinch of sesame seeds)

planar-binding.name: Planar Binding
planar-binding.components: V, S, M (a jewel worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

plane-shift.name: Plane Shift
plane-shift.components: V, S, M (a forked, metal rod worth at least 250 gp, attuned to a particular plane of existence)

private-sanctum.name: Private Sanctum
private-sanctum.components: V, S, M (a thin sheet of lead, a piece of opaque glass, a wad of cotton or cloth, and powdered chrysolite)

programmed-illusion.name: Programmed Illusion
programmed-illusion.components: V, S, M (a bit of fleece and jade dust worth at least 25 gp)

project-image.name: Project Image
project-image.components: V, S, M (a small replica of you made from materials worth at least 5 gp)

protection-from-evil-and-good.name: Protection from Evil and Good
protection-from-evil-and-good.components: V, S, M (holy water or powdered silver and iron, which the spell consumes)

raise-dead.name: Raise Dead
raise-dead.components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 500 gp, which the spell consumes)

regenerate.name: Regenerate
regenerate.components: V, S, M (a prayer wheel and holy water)

reincarnate.name: Reincarnate
reincarnate.components: V, S, M (rare oils and unguents worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

resilient-sphere.name: Resilient Sphere
resilient-sphere.components: V, S, M (a hemispherical piece of clear crystal and a matching hemispherical piece of gum arabic)

resurrection.name: Resurrection
resurrection.components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

reverse-gravity.name: Reverse Gravity
reverse-gravity.components: V, S, M (a lodestone and iron filings)

revivify.name: Revivify
revivify.components: V, S, M (diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes)

rope-trick.name: Rope Trick
rope-trick.components: V, S, M (powdered corn extract and a twisted loop of parchment)

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.components: V, S, M (a small silver mirror)

scrying.name: Scrying
scrying.components: V, S, M (a focus worth at least 1,000 gp, such as a crystal ball, a silver mirror, or a font filled with holy water)

secret-chest.name: Secret Chest
secret-chest.components: V, S, M (an exquisite chest, 3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet, constructed from rare materials worth at least 5,000 gp, and a Tiny replica made from the same materials worth at least 50 gp)

see-invisibility.name: See Invisibility
see-invisibility.components: V, S, M (a pinch of talc and a small sprinkling of powdered silver)

sending.name: Sending
sending.components: V, S, M (a short piece of fine copper wire)

sequester.name: Sequester
sequester.components: V, S, M (a powder composed of diamond, emerald, ruby, and sapphire dust worth at least 5,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

shapechange.name: Shapechange
shapechange.components: V, S, M (a jade circlet worth at least 1,500 gp, which you must place on your head before you cast the spell)

shatter.name: Shatter
shatter.components: V, S, M (a chip of mica)

shield.name: Shield
shield.castingTime: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

shield-of-faith.name: Shield of Faith
shield-of-faith.components: V, S, M (a small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it)

shillelagh.name: Shillelagh
shillelagh.components: V, S, M (mistletoe, a shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff)

silent-image.name: Silent Image
silent-image.components: V, S, M (a bit of fleece)

simulacrum.name: Simulacrum
simulacrum.components: V, S, M (snow or ice in quantities sufficient to made a life-size copy of the duplicated creature; some hair, fingernail clippings, or other piece of that creature’s body placed inside the snow or ice; and powdered ruby worth 1,500 gp, sprinkled over the duplicate and consumed by the spell)

sleep.name: Sleep
sleep.components: V, S, M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket)

sleet-storm.name: Sleet Storm
sleet-storm.components: V, S, M (a pinch of dust and a few drops of water)

slow.name: Slow

spider-climb.components: V, S, M (a drop of bitumen and a spider)

spike-growth.name: Spike Growth
spike-growth.components: V, S, M (seven sharp thorns or seven small twigs, each sharpened to a point)

stinking-cloud.name: Stinking Cloud
stinking-cloud.components: V, S, M (a rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves)

stone-shape.name: Stone Shape
stone-shape.components: V, S, M (soft clay, which must be worked into roughly the desired shape of the stone object)

stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
stoneskin.components: V, S, M (diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes)

suggestion.name: Suggestion
suggestion.components: V, M (a snake’s tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil)

sunburst.name: Sunburst
sunburst.components: V, S, M (fire and a piece of sunstone)

symbol.name: Symbol

telepathic-bond.name: Telepathic Bond
telepathic-bond.components: V, S, M (pieces of eggshell from two different kinds of creatures)

teleportation-circle.name: Teleportation Circle
teleportation-circle.components: V, M (rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems with 50 gp, which the spell consumes)

tiny-hut.name: Tiny Hut
tiny-hut.components: V, S, M (a small crystal bead)

tongues.name: Tongues
tongues.components: V, M (a small clay model of a ziggurat)

true-polymorph.name: True Polymorph
true-polymorph.components: V, S, M (a drop of mercury, a dollop of gum arabic, and a wisp of smoke)

true-resurrection.name: True Resurrection
true-resurrection.components: V, S, M (a sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth at least 25,000 gp, which the spell consumes)

true-seeing.name: True Seeing
true-seeing.components: V, S, M (an ointment for the eyes that costs 25 gp; is made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat; and is consumed by the spell)

unseen-servant.name: Unseen Servant
unseen-servant.components: V, S, M (a piece of string and a bit of wood)

wall-of-fire.name: Wall of Fire
wall-of-fire.components: V, S, M (a small piece of phosphorus)

wall-of-force.name: Wall of Force
wall-of-force.components: V, S, M (a pinch of powder made by crushing a clear gemstone)

wall-of-ice.name: Wall of Ice
wall-of-ice.components: V, S, M (a small piece of quartz)

wall-of-stone.name: Wall of Stone
wall-of-stone.components: V, S, M (a small block of granite)

wall-of-thorns.name: Wall of Thorns
wall-of-thorns.components: V, S, M (a handful of thorns)

warding-bond.name: Warding Bond
warding-bond.components: V, S, M (a pair of platinum rings worth at least 50 gp each, which you and the target must wear for the duration)

water-breathing.name: Water Breathing
water-breathing.components: V, S, M (a short reed or piece of straw)

water-walk.name: Water Walk

wind-walk.name: Wind Walk
